LocationExplainToPage.locationMomenteryMessage: To fully benefit from our app's functionality, we need to use your location. Your location information will be used to provide better services, help you find nearby facilities, and enhance your experience. (This is a mandatory permission, if you do not grant it, the app will close!)

BottomSheet.textFormFieldHelperText: Min 2 characters. Can be changed later.
BottomSheet.dropDownMenuHintText: You will receive a notification when you enter the selected distance!
BottomSheet.bottomSheetAgainHelperText: Choose how many repetitions there will be.
BottomSheet.bottomSheetDistanceHelperText: Select the distance at which you want to receive an alert.
BottomSheet.bottomSheetFrequencyHelperText: The reference day is today. For example, if 'Once a month' is selected, it will become active 30 days later to notify you, and will remain inactive at other times even if you enter the area. The left side indicates the days and the right side indicates how many times it will run. E.g., 30/1 means it will run once every 30 days.
BottomSheet.bottomSheetFrequencyOtherSelectedTextFor: Enter a value for how many days

deleteAllDataAlertDialog.title: All data will be deleted!
deleteAllDataAlertDialog.content: This action is irreversible and deletes all saved locations. Are you sure?

HomePage.mapsOnTapUpdate: Detailed information about the selected place will be added soon.
HomePage.mapsOnTapUserInformation: For now, the value will be deleted after receiving a notification once.

PositiveAndNegativeAlertDialog.title: Will be deleted
PositiveAndNegativeAlertDialog.content: This saved data will be deleted. Do you confirm? This action cannot be undone.
